title: 6/22 Connection Issues on EU
body:
>UPDATE: 4pm PT We've had confirmation that using a VPN has been able to help some players get logged in! By using a VPN, your connection can be routed in a way so that it avoids certain unreliable ISP nodes.



We've noticed our EU players have been having difficulty getting logged in on the client, getting a string of disconnections, or simply never seeing any champions in champ select. While these issues can sometimes stem from server problems or network issues, We're beginning to suspect that this might be centralized around specific ISP nodes based on player traceroutes. 

We've seen that some players have had success getting logged back in by [**reconfiguring their DNS settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5). This isn't necessarily a 100% fix, but we'd like to give this a go if nothing else has worked for you. 

If troubleshooting that DNS wasn't able to help, do us a favor and run a traceroute using [**WinMTR**](http://winmtr.net/) and the IP for your region below. Take that traceroute info and send it over to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can get a better idea of how to fix this issue up!

IP for EUNE Traceroute: 31.186.224.42

IP for EUW Traceroute:192.64.170.252

replies.body: Also if this is our issue, how come we are able to perfecly use the NA client, and connect to the na server, without lags( ofc the 160 ping from the distance) but other than that, no lags picking a champ, no lags logging in, no lags stuck in auth or loading, how does that make sense? if our ISP providers fucks up how come we are still able to play in such a perfect condition in NA, someone please explain me that.
Crazy thing is, I'm in NA and am having the same issue. I can't authenticate on NA but it's perfectly fine if I try to connect to LAN.
i wonder if old client would work =D{{summoner:4}}
I'm done waiting for these bastards that promise to fix this issue and do absolutely nothing in the end, I'm uninstalling this shitty buggy game
uh

Why is this on the NA boards? There is a discussion on the eune/euw boards with over 140 comments sitting there for 18 hours with no response and all of a sudden thanks to a wrenchman dude that finally tried to move things forward I find out there r several discussions here with multiple rioter responses...Why do we have to come here and write for problems on eune/euw it makes no sense....honestly?
Can I get the link to the eune/euw thread with the so many responses. I cannot find it. Thanks in advance.
I was walking my dog would have answered sooner here it is >> https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/Uv6mc3w3-league-client-stuck-on-authenticating
Thanks!

Can I get the link to the eune/euw thread with the so many responses. I cannot find it. Thanks in advance.

Edit: Checked your Boards profile and found the thread. Sorry to bother.

It really solved the issue! Thanks a lot, my client works just fine now and my game runs smoothly!
I highly reccomet trying it
How u solved your problem? U are using VPN or what? And give me the VPN name if it is...

Updated my ticket. Been having the issue for a week now.

I'm using a VPN as a workaround for now, and it's working.
how do you use a vpn I'm a nab
Actually that worked for me. Thank you very much. I reccomend trying it if nothing works.
My results screen is facing an issue it takes way too much time for it to load
Are you sure that's not to do with the "close client while in game" option being enabled? If you have it on, the client has to restart itself from scratch every time you enter the post game lobby.

They will fix it soon as possible boys! :)



Hey game100bg,

Thank you for contacting us regarding this issue!

We are aware that players from Bulgaria are having troubles connecting to League of Legends. Unfortunately, I cannot provide any estimate for the completion date at this time but we are working hard to fix this.

Thank you for the cooperation with providing the logs! We will fix this issue as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have more questions!

Your friend,

Sacred Papone of Order
Riot Games Player Support Specialist

"No going back."

When are they going to fix it?
It's been 2 WEEKS, since this happened and nothing.
Even after patch 7.13, nothing happened.
Will this be the end for me playing league?Because it looks like it.I hope it's not, so please just do something, please, please and please.
When you will deal with it?
My main connection is VPN. Still have problems.
